fields.name: Frostfang
fields.description: +10 Ability Power +2 Gold per 10 seconds +50% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 10 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds. Killing a minion disables this passive for 12 seconds. Limited to 1 Gold Income item
